root.data: Goal 3. Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages3.a Strengthen in all countries, as appropriate, the implementation of the World Health Organization's Framework Convention on Tobacco Control3.a.1.Prevalence of current tobacco consumption among those over 15 years of age (comparative rates by age)2020ISTEEBUNDAYISENGA ModestDepartment of Social Studies and Statistics and Poverty Monitoring, Ponit focal ODDHead of Service and Focal Point79401937ndayimode2010@gmail.comIt is the proportion of people aged 15 and over who use tobacco compared to the entire population aged 15 and over%EDSB-III, 2016-2017Data are collected from household surveys using the "household" questionnaireThe probable date of the next collection will be 2021 (Next DHS)In 2022ISTEEBUISTEEBU is responsible for compiling this indicator at the national levelISTEEBU is the body recognized by the Burundian government for the collection, processing and dissemination of official statistics helping in planning and decision-making.The indicator is relevant because it reflects the demographic and health situation of the population.Updating the indicator requires a household survey which is very resource intensive.Ratio of people aged 15 and over who use tobacco to the population aged 15 and over, multiplied by 100The results of the survey are validated at two levels: technical validation and official validation before publicationThe indicator is available at national levelThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international levelDemographic and Health Survey Report
